entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 12:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:04 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:04 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
